chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通When was the last time you had a cold or the flu_ What do you do w
chunks.chunk_text: Hello everyone, welcome to English All Pass.My name is Kenneth Chee.歡迎來到口說英語通。我是騎兵老師。In this unit, we're going to talk about having a cold or the flu.這個單元裡面呢,我們要來練習談談have a cold 感冒或者是have the flu 得到流感。那麼我們首先趕快來聽一下這個單元的問題。

一天10分鐘 英語說得通When was the last time you had a cold or the flu_ What do you do w
chunks.chunk_text: 今天的這個問題呢,問的是When was the last time you had a cold or the flu?

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通When was the last time you had a cold or the flu_ What do you do w
chunks.chunk_text: 什麼呢?我們來看一下回答。Every year, flu viruses make people sick.他說每年呢,流感的病毒。flu viruses flu 就是流感的意思。那virus 就是病毒。所以flu viruses make people sick 總是會有很多的流感病毒讓大家都生病。I remember last time I had the flu was last spring.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通When was the last time you had a cold or the flu_ What do you do w
chunks.chunk_text: 所以我們馬上就講出來是去年春天 last spring 得到的流感。That was pretty bad.那這邊就指的真的是很嚴重的意思。I had coughs, headaches, and a fever.And my whole body was aching.這邊呢,都是症狀的描述。第一個,I had coughs.咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳咳

chunks.chunk_text: 然後呢,and my whole body was aching.當時全身痛得不得了

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通When was the last time you had a cold or the flu_ What do you do w
chunks.chunk_text: I stayed in bed for almost two days and finally recovered.我整整躺在牀上兩天Stayed in bed 就是躺在牀上的意思for almost two days 幾乎是兩天,整整兩天都躺在牀上and finally recovered 最後總算復原recover 是一個動詞,就是復原的意思那麼下面接著

chunks.chunk_text: When I get a cold or the fluI will go to see a doctor, stay home and rest.當我生病的時候啊或是得到流感的時候呢那麼我就去看醫生那這邊要特別提醒你一下get a cold 在英文裡面感冒說法是get a cold 或是have a cold那至於流感的話呢你看到了,它習慣上是搭配定慣詞the

chunks.chunk_text: 所以你要說的是have the flu 好,這個要小心不要說錯囉它說呢,感冒啊,流感的時候呢I will go to see a doctor 我就會去看醫生stay home 留在家裡面and rest 當然要好好的休息了If you have a cold or the flu, don't go to work or school because you're only going to make other people sick 如果你真的
